author: Del Quentin Wilber
title: Text Messages May Shed Light on Judge’s Recusal in Flynn Case
text:
A federal judge may have recused himself from overseeing the case of Michael Flynn, President Donald Trump’s first national security adviser, because a personal friend was connected to the matter, newly disclosed messages exchanged between two FBI officials suggest.
The federal judge, Rudolph Contreras, recused himself after accepting Mr. Flynn’s guilty plea in December to one count of lying to the FBI about his conversations with a Russian diplomat in the weeks before Mr. Trump was inaugurated.
...
